name: UpRunner
description:
Gamepad > left stick for left/right, X Y B A for 4-dir bounce. START to suicide. SELECT to replay personal best. 

Keyboard > Q or A for left, D for right, arrow keys for 4-dir bounce. X to suicide. ENTER to replay personal best. 

Detailed controls >

When colliding with a wall at your left and holding the left button, you will go up. Same for right walls.

When near a wall at your left and pressing the left bounce button, you will bounce off the wall. Same for up/right/down (down act as a jump).

If you manage to reach a certain speed, you'll receive a burst of speed (hearable by a sound).

Sub 10000ms is possible! Good luck!
